item.description:
JANUARY 18 TO FEBRUARY 5 A deliciously wicked story of love, based on the scandalous 1782 French novel, spins a sinister tale of jealousy, seduction and lust. As the French Revolution approaches, a treacherous man and woman devise a cruel game of revenge intended to destroy a pious married woman, a virginal girl and her innocent first love. If you are interested in going please let me know... FEBRUARY 4 at 7:30 dinner before if you are interested, say 5:30... Any suggestion for dinner???? let me know.... Can book seats together but need to let me know and to pay ahead of time.. Price is the same $39.. ( could not book on Super Bowl Sunday..... sorry)

 

WE COULD MEET EARLIER FOR A LIGHT DINNER....  LET ME KNOW YOUR THOUGHTS..  WHEN IT GETS CLOSER PLEASE SEND ME $39, FOR THE SIDE OF NORTHERN STAGE... ALL SEATS ARE EXCELLENT.... sooner we book seats the more likely we will have the chance of sitting together....

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: NORTHERN STAGE: LES LIAISONS DANGEREUSES
